channel.title: Client/Server Error...?
channel.description:
Hi, I have a downloaded client and my source is an Allstar (317). I know this can be fixed, because I have fixed it about a year ago, but forgot how. If the picture is broken please click the link and look at the picture on Photo Bucket. Please tell me how to fix this.
[img]http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/helpme_zpse34dcd76.png.html[/img]
Photo Bucket link to picture: http://s1339.photobucket.com/user/godexserver/media/helpme_zpse34dcd76.png.html
